item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>What a stunning response. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GK8/$File/cry.gif"</a> /><br /><br />I think we might have set the expectations too high last time. How are we gonig to find a keynote drinker at this notice? And we'll have to put out a call for abstracts. The more abstract the abstracts the better!<br /><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded:
What a stunning response. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GK8/$File/cry.gif“ />

I think we might have set the expectations too high last time. How are we gonig to find a keynote drinker at this notice? And we’ll have to put out a call for abstracts. The more abstract the abstracts the better!

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />
